title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 671.4 - Recreational activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 671.4 - Recreational activities

State Regulations

In order to assist persons wishing to undertake
recreational activities on or along the West Branch Delaware River, East Branch

Delaware River, Neversink River or Delaware River, the department reservoir
releases manager shall respond to all inquiries relative to the date, duration, and nature of releases to be or being made pursuant to this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
671.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
